fields.summary: Document 4.2 changes in Imaging Worker configuration and start up

status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
*Assessment*

If a cloud administrator attempts to update any of the following cloud properties:
\\
\\
* services.<service>.worker.keyname
* services.<service>.worker.image
* services.<service>.worker.instance_type
*  services.<service>.worker.availability_zones

The cloudformation template associated with the <service> fails to update, therefore failing to update the attributes associated with the autoscaling group instances.

*Signs*

- Cloud property being changed:
{code}
# euca-modify-property -p services.imaging.worker.keyname=euca-imaging
PROPERTY	services.imaging.worker.keyname	euca-imaging was {}
{code}
-  Autoscaling group being updated to terminate instance, then updated again to relaunch instance:
{code}
# euscale-describe-auto-scaling-groups
AUTO-SCALING-GROUP	euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-7DGM3GBVYXQNX	euca-internal-imaging-service-LaunchConfiguration-SKYF1Z7UIOFKT	region1-az-one		1	1	1	Default
INSTANCE	i-acae6a47	region1-az-one	InService	Healthy	euca-internal-imaging-service-LaunchConfiguration-SKYF1Z7UIOFKT
TAG	auto-scaling-group	euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-7DGM3GBVYXQNX	Name	euca-internal-imaging-workers	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-7DGM3GBVYXQNX	aws:cloudformation:logical-id	ASG	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-7DGM3GBVYXQNX	aws:cloudformation:stack-id	arn:aws:cloudformation::000659705651:stack/euca-internal-imaging-service/ca7f94bb-c064-4192-96ad-f388805ca6db	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-7DGM3GBVYXQNX	aws:cloudformation:stack-name	euca-internal-imaging-service	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-7DGM3GBVYXQNX	service-type	imaging	true

# euscale-update-auto-scaling-group --desired-capacity 0 -M 0 -m 0 euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-7DGM3GBVYXQNX
# euca-describe-instances
RESERVATION	r-adb27faf	000659705651	euca-internal-imaging-service-SecurityGroup-MIGZZ3QMP7LEE
INSTANCE	i-acae6a47	emi-936579c6	euca-10-111-30-208.eucalyptus.localhost	euca-10-111-30-224.eucalyptus.internal	shutting-down		0		m1.small	2015-06-16T21:05:32.750Z	region1-az-one				monitoring-enabled	10.111.30.208	10.111.30.224			instance-store					hvm		8eaea665-3624-45a3-89ed-0153de75fe59_region1-az-one_1	sg-8930e227			arn:aws:iam::000659705651:instance-profile/internal/imaging/euca-internal-imaging-service-InstanceProfile-XTMFSQH9R1H1H	x86_64
TAG	instance	i-acae6a47	Name	euca-internal-imaging-workers
TAG	instance	i-acae6a47	aws:autoscaling:groupName	euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-7DGM3GBVYXQNX
TAG	instance	i-acae6a47	aws:cloudformation:logical-id	ASG
TAG	instance	i-acae6a47	aws:cloudformation:stack-id	arn:aws:cloudformation::000659705651:stack/euca-internal-imaging-service/ca7f94bb-c064-4192-96ad-f388805ca6db
TAG	instance	i-acae6a47	aws:cloudformation:stack-name	euca-internal-imaging-service
TAG	instance	i-acae6a47	service-type	imaging

# euscale-update-auto-scaling-group --desired-capacity 1 -M 1 -m 1 euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-7DGM3GBVYXQNX
# # euca-describe-instances
RESERVATION	r-4c822564	000659705651	euca-internal-imaging-service-SecurityGroup-MIGZZ3QMP7LEE
INSTANCE	i-3aff61e0	emi-936579c6	euca-10-111-30-198.eucalyptus.h-33.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-10-111-30-227.eucalyptus.internal	running		0		m1.small	2015-06-19T00:02:52.495Z	region1-az-one				monitoring-enabled	10.111.30.198	10.111.30.227			instance-store					hvm		1980781b-309c-49fe-80ab-9c2a4e584989_region1-az-one_1	sg-8930e227			arn:aws:iam::000659705651:instance-profile/internal/imaging/euca-internal-imaging-service-InstanceProfile-XTMFSQH9R1H1H	x86_64
TAG	instance	i-3aff61e0	Name	euca-internal-imaging-workers
TAG	instance	i-3aff61e0	aws:autoscaling:groupName	euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-7DGM3GBVYXQNX
TAG	instance	i-3aff61e0	aws:cloudformation:logical-id	ASG
TAG	instance	i-3aff61e0	aws:cloudformation:stack-id	arn:aws:cloudformation::000659705651:stack/euca-internal-imaging-service/ca7f94bb-c064-4192-96ad-f388805ca6db
TAG	instance	i-3aff61e0	aws:cloudformation:stack-name	euca-internal-imaging-service
TAG	instance	i-3aff61e0	service-type	imaging
RESERVATION	r-adb27faf	000659705651	euca-internal-imaging-service-SecurityGroup-MIGZZ3QMP7LEE
INSTANCE	i-acae6a47	emi-936579c6	euca-10-111-30-208.eucalyptus.localhost	euca-10-111-30-224.eucalyptus.internal	shutting-down		0		m1.small	2015-06-16T21:05:32.750Z	region1-az-one				monitoring-enabled	10.111.30.208	10.111.30.224			instance-store					hvm		8eaea665-3624-45a3-89ed-0153de75fe59_region1-az-one_1	sg-8930e227			arn:aws:iam::000659705651:instance-profile/internal/imaging/euca-internal-imaging-service-InstanceProfile-XTMFSQH9R1H1H	x86_64
TAG	instance	i-acae6a47	Name	euca-internal-imaging-workers
TAG	instance	i-acae6a47	aws:autoscaling:groupName	euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-7DGM3GBVYXQNX
TAG	instance	i-acae6a47	aws:cloudformation:logical-id	ASG
TAG	instance	i-acae6a47	aws:cloudformation:stack-id	arn:aws:cloudformation::000659705651:stack/euca-internal-imaging-service/ca7f94bb-c064-4192-96ad-f388805ca6db
TAG	instance	i-acae6a47	aws:cloudformation:stack-name	euca-internal-imaging-service
TAG	instance	i-acae6a47	service-type	imaging
# euca-terminate-instances i-acae6a47
INSTANCE	i-acae6a47	terminated	terminated
# euca-describe-instances
RESERVATION	r-4c822564	000659705651	euca-internal-imaging-service-SecurityGroup-MIGZZ3QMP7LEE
INSTANCE	i-3aff61e0	emi-936579c6	euca-10-111-30-198.eucalyptus.h-33.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-10-111-30-227.eucalyptus.internal	running		0		m1.small	2015-06-19T00:02:52.495Z	region1-az-one				monitoring-enabled	10.111.30.198	10.111.30.227			instance-store					hvm		1980781b-309c-49fe-80ab-9c2a4e584989_region1-az-one_1	sg-8930e227			arn:aws:iam::000659705651:instance-profile/internal/imaging/euca-internal-imaging-service-InstanceProfile-XTMFSQH9R1H1H	x86_64
TAG	instance	i-3aff61e0	Name	euca-internal-imaging-workers
TAG	instance	i-3aff61e0	aws:autoscaling:groupName	euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-7DGM3GBVYXQNX
TAG	instance	i-3aff61e0	aws:cloudformation:logical-id	ASG
TAG	instance	i-3aff61e0	aws:cloudformation:stack-id	arn:aws:cloudformation::000659705651:stack/euca-internal-imaging-service/ca7f94bb-c064-4192-96ad-f388805ca6db
TAG	instance	i-3aff61e0	aws:cloudformation:stack-name	euca-internal-imaging-service
TAG	instance	i-3aff61e0	service-type	imaging

## Stack parameter variables
# euform-describe-stacks
STACK	euca-internal-imaging-service	CREATE_COMPLETE	Complete!	Imaging worker stack	2015-06-16T21:05:14.015Z
PARAMETER	CERTARN		****
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-936579c6
PARAMETER	InitScript
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.small
PARAMETER	KeyName
PARAMETER	NtpServer
PARAMETER	LogServer
PARAMETER	LogServerPort		514
PARAMETER	ImagingServiceUrl		imaging.localhost
PARAMETER	EuareServiceUrl		euare.localhost
PARAMETER	ComputeServiceUrl		compute.localhost
PARAMETER	VmExpirationDays		180
PARAMETER	AvailabilityZones		region1-az-one
PARAMETER	NumberOfWorkers		1
{code}

*Steps*

# Set up Eucalyptus 4.2 cloud with Eucalyptus DNS, Service Image and Load Balancing Image
# Bundled, uploaded and registered a paravirtual image
# Started an instance from the paravirtual EMI
# Noticed that the Service Image didn't have a keyname associated with the instance.  Downloaded credentials for the '(eucalyptus)imaging' account to add a keypair.
# Changed the {{services.imaging.worker.keyname}} cloud property to the keypair created under the '(eucalyptus)imaging' account
# Using the credentials from the '(eucalyptus)imaging' admin user, updated the AS group associated with the Service image to terminate the instance, then updated the AS group to relaunch the instance
# Noticed the keyname was not associated to the instance part of the AS group.
{code}
# euca-describe-instances
RESERVATION	r-4c822564	000659705651	euca-internal-imaging-service-SecurityGroup-MIGZZ3QMP7LEE
INSTANCE	i-3aff61e0	emi-936579c6	euca-10-111-30-198.eucalyptus.h-33.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-10-111-30-227.eucalyptus.internal	running		0		m1.small	2015-06-19T00:02:52.495Z	region1-az-one				monitoring-enabled	10.111.30.198	10.111.30.227			instance-store					hvm		1980781b-309c-49fe-80ab-9c2a4e584989_region1-az-one_1	sg-8930e227			arn:aws:iam::000659705651:instance-profile/internal/imaging/euca-internal-imaging-service-InstanceProfile-XTMFSQH9R1H1H	x86_64
TAG	instance	i-3aff61e0	Name	euca-internal-imaging-workers
TAG	instance	i-3aff61e0	aws:autoscaling:groupName	euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-7DGM3GBVYXQNX
TAG	instance	i-3aff61e0	aws:cloudformation:logical-id	ASG
TAG	instance	i-3aff61e0	aws:cloudformation:stack-id	arn:aws:cloudformation::000659705651:stack/euca-internal-imaging-service/ca7f94bb-c064-4192-96ad-f388805ca6db
TAG	instance	i-3aff61e0	aws:cloudformation:stack-name	euca-internal-imaging-service
TAG	instance	i-3aff61e0	service-type	imaging
{code}
# Noticed the cloudformation parameters associated to the Service image stack had not been updated:
{code}
# euform-describe-stacks
STACK	euca-internal-imaging-service	CREATE_COMPLETE	Complete!	Imaging worker stack	2015-06-16T21:05:14.015Z
PARAMETER	CERTARN		****
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-936579c6
PARAMETER	InitScript
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.small
PARAMETER	KeyName
PARAMETER	NtpServer
PARAMETER	LogServer
PARAMETER	LogServerPort		514
PARAMETER	ImagingServiceUrl		imaging.localhost
PARAMETER	EuareServiceUrl		euare.localhost
PARAMETER	ComputeServiceUrl		compute.localhost
PARAMETER	VmExpirationDays		180
PARAMETER	AvailabilityZones		region1-az-one
PARAMETER	NumberOfWorkers		1
{code}
fields.summary: Cloud property attributes associated with Services Image fails to update

comments.body: [~hspencer], this is not a bug. Design was changed between 4.1 and 4.2. You have to recreate stack with esi-manage-stack if you changed any of imaging service properties after you created stack originally.

[~vasya],

Thanks for your response.  Do we have a doc ticket to update the information regarding behavior change?
